projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: A modern, responsive personal website built with Gatsby and React. Features smooth animations, dark theme, and showcases my projects and experiences.

projects.title: FocusFlow
projects.description: A productivity app designed for ADHD and neurodivergent individuals. Features habit tracking, skill development, and visual progress indicators.

projects.title: FridgeMind
projects.description: An intelligent food management app that helps users track ingredients, suggest recipes, and reduce food waste through smart recommendations.
